io.micronaut.http.server.netty.jackson

Class JsonContentProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.core.async.subscriber.CompletionAwareSubscriber<T>
      • io.micronaut.core.async.processor.SingleSubscriberProcessor<io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder,T>
        • io.micronaut.http.server.netty.AbstractHttpContentProcessor<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>
          • io.micronaut.http.server.netty.jackson.JsonContentProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Completable, Emitter<io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder>, Toggleable, HttpContentProcessor<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>, Processor<io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder,com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>, Publisher<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>, Subscriber<io.netty.buffer.ByteBufHolder>

    public class JsonContentProcessor
extends AbstractHttpContentProcessor<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode>
    This class will handle subscribing to a JSON stream and binding once the events are complete in a non-blocking manner.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
